Hello, I\'m D4rK, my real name is Michael, and I make 3D animations in Source Filmmaker and probably other programs soon. I have a secondary channel for tutorials & more called Michael Tutorials. If you like my work leave a like, share and subscribe for more. And, if you need other information you can find here or you can ask me.
Hello, I\'m Michael and I make a lot of videos especially tutorials XD. If you need the \'Pro\' version of apps you can tell me and I make tutorials.
Make a suggestion. Or report an issue!
Open an issue on GitHub from the app. No account needed and everything is free.
